fields.Title: JAM / PALEDRIVER
fields.Description: A small, old, shrivelled up mesque woman with thinning hair sits awkwardly on the ledge of a lorry. An empty, glazed look adorns her eyes. She murmurs while nodding her head to the music coming from a radio in her lorry cabin. She wears a squared truck-driver flannel shirt with sleeves wrapped up to her elbows and blue denim dungarees tucked in yellow-brown (Caterpillar) boots.

fields.Title: You: ""Before I came, you seemed... *away..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Before I came, you seemed... *away*."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*Ah*. And what do I care about the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Ah*. And what do I care about the Union boss? He's not Gabriel, he's not Franconegro. He's not even Hermenegildo the Hand."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know, the thrill of the cr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, the thrill of the criminal lifestyle?"

fields.Title: You: ""And they live happily ever after?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And they live happily ever after?"

fields.Title: You: ""I still don't really understand th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still don't really understand this whole *boiadeiro* thing."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You hear that, lawman? I don't thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You hear that, lawman? I don't think your partner likes you spending too much time with me..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I'm a lady like you're Gabriel Bue..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a lady like you're Gabriel Buenguerro -- only in dreams."

fields.Title: Drama: "It's because of the pale. He doesn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's because of the pale. He doesn't want your frail mind caught up in it -- and this woman has spent time *in* the pale. A lot of time.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's worried. But not for her -- fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's worried. But not for her -- for you. Hmm. What is it about this woman, if she's not connected to anything?

fields.Title: You: ""These are not the boots I was look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These are not the boots I was looking for."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Good. I don't care about drugs. Li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. I don't care about drugs. Little molecules. They're nothing." She glances wistfully at the photo.

fields.Title: Volition: "Something in her is pulling toward..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something in her is pulling toward some unknown rest state. She twitches -- like a sleep kick.

fields.Title: You: ""You're a paledriver. You transport..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a paledriver. You transport goods through the pale."
fields.Alternate1: "You're a paledriver. You transport goods through the pale -- whatever it is."

fields.Title: You: ""Everything is related to the pale...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything is related to the pale. My condition. The case. Everything. It's all *entroponetic*."

fields.Title: You: ""Not on this lorry then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not on this lorry then?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""No -- the same one. A *roller*. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- the same one. A *roller*. They all are nowadays. Special wheels for connecting to the floor of the hold." She points to the machines, clumped up like toys.

fields.Title: You: ""The Motorway South?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Motorway South?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's get some air. This one's far..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's get some air. This one's far gone..." He shakes his head silently as he turns to leave.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "If you want to know more about Ruby..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you want to know more about Ruby, this is a dead end. She's only heard the word 'lady' and latched onto it. You can push on if you're interested in *that*, though.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, I'd like to have a word with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, I'd like to have a word with you about this *side task* of yours..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "That's the most you can get out of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's the most you can get out of her -- only shapes and sensations, no dictionary definitions or scientific explanations...

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Where do you want me to go? This i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where do you want me to go? This isn't so bad. I can listen to music, or the seagulls. Look at all the colours and the features of this world. It's a good palate-cleanser, this jamboree..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman sways her wrinkled shell back and forth, a strange grin across her face.

fields.Title: You: ""Well, that's good enough for me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, that's good enough for me."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "Her shoulder bones crack as she shr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her shoulder bones crack as she shrugs. "Maybe. Probably not. Makes no difference to me either way."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you making fun of me right now..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you making fun of me right now? You better start complying."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""He was the biggest star of his day..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was the biggest star of his day. Girls used to faint in the aisles of the cinema whenever he came on the screen, and school boys used to memorize all his lines..." She leans back, savouring the world she's conjured up.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait..." The lieutenant stops you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait..." The lieutenant stops you before you can snap.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's the warmth of a winter night's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the warmth of a winter night's fire. Maybe she could give you comfort and shelter? Some cigarettes and food money? Maybe she's your...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's just a distracted old woman...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's just a distracted old woman. We should maybe let her get back to her things..."

fields.Title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is a cow herder from upstream Magritte, the great steppes of Northern Mesque. He is a rugged individualist and explorer.

fields.Title: You: ""Now the other one please.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now the other one please."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what do you mean it *was* th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what do you mean it *was* the coronation of Franconegro?"
fields.Alternate1: "Wait... by it *being* the coronation of Franconegro you mean..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a detective. I need to know th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a detective. I need to know things."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not an idiot. I'm a detective..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not an idiot. I'm a detective of the RCM. Don't say I'm an idiot."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The look on her face -- like an or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The look on her face -- like an orgasm. The wound in her chest. My hand in my father's hand..." She closes her eyes, her eyelids trembling. "Except I never had a father. And I never shot Her Innocence Dolores Dei."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Thought insertion? *Dithering*? Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thought insertion? *Dithering*? The Graad-Katla Magistral?" She savours the lungful. "It's more than dangerous -- it's *sad*. But... at first I had to make a living. Now..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""What are we *doing* here? For thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are we *doing* here? For thousands of years, Gabriel... It doesn't have to be like this. We can just give up. We can just become vapour."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "'In the centre of this town there's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'In the centre of this town there's a ghostly motorway', she sang.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Are you s-s-sure you want to do tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you s-s-sure you want to do that? Remember what happened *last* time...

fields.Title: You: ""What *is* it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *is* it?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""No, lawman. Diamonds." She grins."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, lawman. Diamonds." She grins.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Then what *were* you getting at?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then what *were* you getting at?"

fields.Title: You: ""Grandma?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Grandma?"

fields.Title: You: ""I've already got too many records..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've already got too many records to listen to as it is. Change of topic."

fields.Title: You: ""That's a terrible song.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a terrible song."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Of course not," she says, grinning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not," she says, grinning. "But wouldn't it be marvellous if I was?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*Someone* was..." She nods as thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Someone* was..." She nods as though her meaning were perfectly clear.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Just before Gabriel it was the cor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just before Gabriel it was the coronation of Franconegro -- now *there* was a real man..." There is no aberration in the pattern that you can see. She puts her foot down.

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She's wearing sturdy worker's boots..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's wearing sturdy worker's boots made of black leather. Buckles run across. The sole is also made of leather.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Segure..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Segure-me, Paraíso'..." She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me then. I remember everything -- even the things I never knew."

fields.Title: You: ""Over-radiation?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Over-radiation?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I've only felt it in the distance...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've only felt it in the distance. When I was a child..." She goes silent, her eyes close and her hands shake. "A child. Rowing on the lake."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "All of what -- the world? The prese..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All of what -- the world? The present?

fields.Title: You: ""This is about turning *back* time,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is about turning *back* time, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, you said it *was* possibl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, you said it *was* possible to turn back time, through the pale..."

fields.Title: You: ""It sounds... *wonderful*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It sounds... *wonderful*."

fields.Title: Endurance: "What are you doing? This woman migh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you doing? This woman might be your only chance to figure out how to reverse time... Grow a pair!

fields.Title: You: ""This should be reported to the pro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This should be reported to the proper authorities."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Let me put this another way..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Let me put this another way -- are you smuggling drugs through Terminal B?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I would never make fun of a real l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would never make fun of a real lawman, *xerife*."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Let me ask you something els..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Let me ask you something else, then."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Of course it does -- what did you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course it does -- what did you expect?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who's Gabriel Buenguerro?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who's Gabriel Buenguerro?"

fields.Title: You: ""Me? I am the law around here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Me? I am the law around here."

fields.Title: You: ""*When* else would you be then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*When* else would you be then?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""It's an old ballad about a young g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's an old ballad about a young girl who falls in love with a daring boiadeiro. He promises to marry her as soon as he returns from the Western Plain."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm guessing that doesn't happen.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm guessing that doesn't happen."

fields.Title: You: "Snap your fingers twice."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snap your fingers twice.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Easy. It's the skinny man who thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy. It's the skinny man who thinks he's a poet -- never trust a poet..." She squints across the square. "Also, he's the only one I can see from here."

fields.Title: You: ""You said *long* haul. That's...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said *long* haul. That's..."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. No need to be direct.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. No need to be direct."

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""When you've seen it all go *away*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When you've seen it all go *away* like that. Rolling off like the sea. And then come back to this..." She gestures at the square: the broken horse monument, the shadows of the machines in the night.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You see, we've already spent t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You see, we've already spent too much time on this nonsensical side-errand. There's no magical fascist who's going to unwind time for you..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Stop. There's nothing else she can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. There's nothing else she can do for you, but this isn't the end of the line. No, there's one more kingsman to confront.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Yes. What about it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. What about it?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Is that all you woke me up to say?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that all you woke me up to say?"

fields.Title: You: ""You seem like a woman who knows a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem like a woman who knows a thing or two about drugs."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Just this month I made half a doze..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just this month I made half a dozen trips from Saramiriza to Graad, on the U41-A. What do you think they take from Saramiriza to Graad, lawman?"

fields.Title: You: ""I wanted to ask if you'd be intere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wanted to ask if you'd be interested in smuggling some drugs?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where else would you be then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where else would you be then?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Back in Mesque during the time of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back in Mesque during the time of the Revolution." The smile returns to her face. "The sidewalks and cafes are filled with young people... I was on my way to see a new boiadeiro picture starring Gabriel Buenguerro."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The small wrinkled woman does not g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The small wrinkled woman does not greet you. She nods along to something on her radio. A photograph is clutched in her hands and there is a warm smile on her face.

fields.Title: You: ""Excuse me, ma'am, I'd like to ask..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me, ma'am, I'd like to ask some questions."

fields.Title: Half Light: "No. This one is a monster in disgui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. This one is a monster in disguise.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I wasn't dreaming. I was *there*,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wasn't dreaming. I was *there*, lawman. It was early spring and 'The Man Behind The Black Sun' had just come out. The posters were twenty metres tall. Everything was golden..." Her eyes narrow and she appears to take your measure.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I'm only terrifying to small child..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm only terrifying to small children. And to those who used to know me."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "There's something off about this wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something off about this woman. Tell her to show you the soles of her boots. Maybe she was at the hanging... somehow?

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The Trans-Katla Magistral. U41-A...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Trans-Katla Magistral. U41-A. As Estradas do Mirador. All the good ones. The deep trenches. Where the bluebirds fly." She opens her eyes again and shudders.

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She raises her boot, slowly -- with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She raises her boot, slowly -- with contempt -- and says. "I'm starting to think you should let me get back to Gabriel Buenguerro. You're no Gabriel..."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Lay off her."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lay off her.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine, then." He sighs. "Just try n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine, then." He sighs. "Just try not to black out again. And don't *contemplate*. We don't have time for that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is *exactly* what I didn't wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is *exactly* what I didn't want you to think..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*Oh meu deus*, the Lawman solved t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Oh meu deus*, the Lawman solved the case..." She lights the cigarette. A white cloud of smoke disappears into her mouth.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "'República', a filterless cigarette..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'República', a filterless cigarette from Mesque.

fields.Title: You: ""'República'." (Smell the air.) "Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'República'." (Smell the air.) "That's not very healthy."

fields.Title: You: ""I blacked out after a night of hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I blacked out after a night of heavy drinking and lost all memory of the world."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Their wheels all small and round, m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Their wheels all small and round, multi-axle trailers.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "C'mon, he thinks -- she's not the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: C'mon, he thinks -- she's not the lady driver.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Yes -- go. Enough jamboree. I need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- go. Enough jamboree. I need to get back to Mesque..." Her voice trails off.

fields.Title: You: ""You're saying the future will *be*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're saying the future will *be* the past..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now come on, let's leave this one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now come on, let's leave this one to her reveries." He shakes his head silently as he turns to leave.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Then it's contraband, lawman. What..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then it's contraband, lawman. What? Do you want to take an old woman in? Be my guest. Lock me away like Bad Hand Hermenegildo."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's just a distracted old woman...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's just a distracted old woman. Better to leave her alone."

fields.Title: You: ""Right. I have some other questions..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. I have some other questions for you. Police questions." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "She seems to derive some bitter ple..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She seems to derive some bitter pleasure from this strange thought. As if the past will one day wipe the present away, like a tidal wave approaching.

fields.Title: You: ""Should you drive a lorry if you ge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Should you drive a lorry if you get like that?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Irmão..." she breathes out. "I alr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Irmão..." she breathes out. "I already *am* dust."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Alright. Let's get you a pale-categ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright. Let's get you a pale-category licence and roll that doobie up!

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Neither is pale transportation." S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither is pale transportation." She shrugs. "Life is transitory."

fields.Title: You: ""I would rather have what I have th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would rather have what I have than what you have."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""It's a story us longhaulsmen tell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a story us longhaulsmen tell -- longhaulsmen, *xerife*, not *paledrivers* -- way beyond the established pale that's lit by radio frequencies. Where it goes silent."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She clearly doesn't think she's a '..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She clearly doesn't think she's a 'lady'. Don't repeat it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're still on this ridiculous *si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're still on this ridiculous *side-task*, I see..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

fields.Title: You: ""You mean, we'll all be drowned in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean, we'll all be drowned in our own past..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "The lieutenant is right. It's the o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is right. It's the only way forward. Face yourself, kingsman!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just a moment, detective. Before w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a moment, detective. Before we go, I'd like a word with you about this *side task* of yours..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The woman is still hunched over the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman is still hunched over the railing, her head swaying to the music, her eyes looking at nothing in particular.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm something of an expert in blac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm something of an expert in blacking out. You should take better care of yourself."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""If you don't know, pfft!" She flic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you don't know, pfft!" She flicks her wrist in a gesture of casual dismissal.

fields.Title: You: "Take a look."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take a look.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""They're beautiful. That is all tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're beautiful. That is all that matters. Beautiful and true -- and they will win. They're *coming* for this, you know..." She looks around. "All of this."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The woman's malevolent cackling fil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman's malevolent cackling fills the roundabout.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Oh, it's so much more than *high*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, it's so much more than *high* where I go, xerife. It's *low* -- I go to the bottom..." She closes her eyes in reverie.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay -- let's change the subject.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay -- let's change the subject."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He asked the Pines rep about the pale."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""No offence, but *your partner*..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No offence, but *your partner*..." She lights the cigarette, a white and silver cloud of smoke disappears into her mouth.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Pergun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Pergunte à Poeira.'" She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me, then. I remember everything -- even things I never knew."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No elaboration."
fields.Dialogue Text: No elaboration.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Maybe you've been down the *Motorw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you've been down the *Motorway South?*" She looks at her cigarette, it's almost out. She has swallowed it hungrily. Then at you...

fields.Title: You: ""'It takes all the people where the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'It takes all the people where they want to stay.'"

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is nothing more to do now. Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is nothing more to do now. She's far away.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You don't need to turn back time...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't need to turn back time. The pale is already churning with it. As the tide of pale rises, so does the past. Someday both will cover the whole world. That's it. That's the story."

fields.Title: Endurance: "This is all you're going to get out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is all you're going to get out of her. There's nothing more for you here.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Thought insertion? *Dithering*? Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thought insertion? *Dithering*? The Graad-Katla Magistral?" She savours the lungful. "There's a kind of wonder there -- a *sad* wonder. But... at first I had to make a living. Now..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "*YOU*."
fields.Dialogue Text: *YOU*.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."]
You: ""You were in a dream. Inactive. Tun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were in a dream. Inactive. Tuned off."

fields.Title: You: ""What is it that you're hauling, ex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it that you're hauling, exactly?"
fields.Alternate1: "Are you sure you don't know what you're hauling? Maybe it's..."

fields.Title: You: ""It's for important police business..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's for important police business, ma'am."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing, I guess. Let's talk about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, I guess. Let's talk about something else."

fields.Title: You: ""You said earlier you don't know wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said earlier you don't know what cargo you're hauling. Could it be drugs?"

fields.Title: You: ""Evrart sent me." (Place finger on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart sent me." (Place finger on the side of your nose and tap twice.)

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't ask you about diamonds, d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't ask you about diamonds, did I? I don't care about that."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "No response. Wherever this woman is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No response. Wherever this woman is, your words fail to reach her.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."]
Paledriver: ""Yes. There is a *protagonista*..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. There is a *protagonista*..." She gestures to the intersection. "And an *adversário*. I am on the side of the Adversary. There's no coming back from that haul."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am, you're not responsible for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, you're not responsible for what the client puts in your lorry as long as the seals are not opened. We officers know that." He gives you a stern look.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Some jamboree you turned out to be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some jamboree you turned out to be... You have about a third of the jawline of Gabriel Buenguerro, and none of the balls." She smiles.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The smell of liquor on Gabriel's l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The smell of liquor on Gabriel's lips after the shoot. In the motor park. The roses on the day of Franconegro's coronation. On the grand stairs of Raehl. The smoke from the fowling piece, when Dolores Dei was shot..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The woman looks at nothing, her eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman looks at nothing, her eyes closed and her lips moving.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I'm terrifying to small children...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm terrifying to small children. And to those who used to know me."

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time to face yourself, mano y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time to face yourself, mano y mano. The next time you find yourself alone before a mirror. *That's* where this will end... The final showdown.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'O Céu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'O Céu Dourado'..." She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me then. I remember everything -- even the things I never knew."

fields.Title: You: ""Because of all those hauls through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because of all those hauls through the pale?"

fields.Title: You: ""I guess that makes sense. Minding..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess that makes sense. Minding your own business."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The photo -- an *ambrotype* from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The photo -- an *ambrotype* from the turn of the century. As golden as her smile.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what's so bad about the Fift..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what's so bad about the Fifties?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""They are someone's memories, boy."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They are someone's memories, boy." She gets gruff, suddenly. "What difference does it make if it's me or not?"

fields.Title: Authority: "This line of questioning is going n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This line of questioning is going nowhere! Try harder!

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I'm not that either, *xerife*." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not that either, *xerife*." Her smile dissipates. "I've gone too far from it all to remember what was between my legs. It doesn't work like that on the *long haul*."

fields.Title: You: ""So... you're *not* the driver ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So... you're *not* the driver everyone is terrified of?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "A terrible cold comes over her. Rat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A terrible cold comes over her. Rattling her teeth, as she stares inward.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Perhaps it was another *xerife* wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps it was another *xerife* who came and woke me up, looking at my boots, asking questions? Or perhaps it was one of the others in this *carnaval*. I don't remember."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The feet of a little girl," she sm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The feet of a little girl," she smiles. "They fit well on the pedals."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You cannot see it but you know it'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You cannot see it but you know it's there. And it's big -- bigger than anything. Bigger than all the other things combined."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Nothing. Until it starts. When you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Until it starts. When you're deep enough -- then, for me... it's like autumn. Dark grey and orange, the orange of streetlights and the colour of trees in the electric light. It smells like autumn too. It smells terrible."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You haven't? Why are you bringing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You haven't? Why are you bringing up *pale* then?"

fields.Title: You: ""Never mind, sorry to bother you."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind, sorry to bother you." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Is that all you wanted to know, la..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that all you wanted to know, lawman?"

fields.Title: You: ""If you had to guess, who do you th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you had to guess, who do you think is smuggling drugs around here?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""I quit concerning myself with that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I quit concerning myself with that a long time ago." She smiles a careless smile. "Besides, I don't drive the lorry for the cargo, if you know what I mean..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Lawman... what in the name of god..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lawman... what in the name of god are you talking about?"

fields.Title: You: ""I was actually hoping *you* could..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was actually hoping *you* could tell me that."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The men have small jaws and everyt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The men have small jaws and everything is made out of plastic. Why do you need plastic?" she scoffs. "When you can make the world out of amber?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- why is that, lieutenant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- why is that, lieutenant?"

fields.Title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "She is not Odd Sole..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Turn to Kim.) "She is not Odd Sole. These are not the boots that made the prints."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""It was," she shrugs. "And then it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was," she shrugs. "And then it was no more. And I was no longer holding my father's hand. He was no longer descending the stairs in Raehl. The crowd had gone silent."
fields.Alternate1: "Pale damage," she nods. "I was *just* holding my father's hand. He was descending the stairs in Raehl. The crowd had gone silent. There was dust in the air..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Like looking into the ocean at nig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like looking into the ocean at night. In the dark."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""'In the middle of this town there'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'In the middle of this town there's a ghostly motorway -- it takes all the people where they want to stay'..."

fields.Title: You: ""Things you never knew?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things you never knew?"
fields.Alternate1: "Things you never knew... so you *have* turned back time!"

fields.Title: You: ""What does it look like? The pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does it look like? The pale?"

fields.Title: You: ""What is at the end of the Motorway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is at the end of the Motorway South?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She is receding. In the clutches of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is receding. In the clutches of some indescribable, scattered emotion. A child. Descending.

fields.Title: You: ""Never mind. I have other questions.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind. I have other questions."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "There is a name for this ideology:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a name for this ideology: Entropolism. A faith in and desire to accelerate the spread of pale across the world, until humanity has reached what its adherents call the 'rest state' of humanity, the final reconciliation of past, present, and future in timeless spirit...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've fried both your brains enou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've fried both your brains enough for today, detective..." He inspects her. No response.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Yes, *yes*. This is what you've bee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, *yes*. This is what you've been searching for...

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I haven't figured anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I haven't figured anything out yet..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Beautiful... it's beautiful.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beautiful... it's beautiful."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's not really what I was getti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not really what I was getting at."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Why would I want to do that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would I want to do that?"

fields.Title: You: ""For the glory of the world republi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For the glory of the world republic. Liberation of the spirit and body."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Damn this. Make her answer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn this. Make her answer.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Diamonds are good for you, lawman...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Diamonds are good for you, lawman. You should try them sometime. Make yourself pretty like Eva Deshoras."

fields.Title: Empathy: "The smile on her face has disappear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smile on her face has disappeared, replaced by the wary aspect of a cornered beast.

fields.Title: Drama: "In the background you can hear the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the background you can hear the orchestra swell as the screen fills with the maiden's imploring eyes...

fields.Title: You: ""Diamonds, really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Diamonds, really?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, but what are you *really* ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, but what are you *really* hauling?"

fields.Title: You: ""So he gives up his riding and sett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So he gives up his riding and settles down, right?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: You: ""So I take it you were in Mesque wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I take it you were in Mesque when you were young?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- you get high off driving a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- you get high off driving a lorry?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. I just don't think she's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. I just don't think she's connected to anything."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Another discrepancy, although not b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another discrepancy, although not boot-related, is the coronation of His Innocence Franconegro. Which happened 500 years ago.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""...seems like a bit of an idiot."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...seems like a bit of an idiot." She breathes out. The air tastes sweet.

fields.Title: You: ""I blacked out -- from sheer heartb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I blacked out -- from sheer heartbreak -- and lost all memory of the world."

fields.Title: You: ""I would rather have what you have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would rather have what you have than what I have."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""Girl child," you hear her say. "Gi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Girl child," you hear her say. "Girl child. Girl child..."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You don't like the sound of that, c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't like the sound of that, chief. All the *really* good stuff is *right here*, in the present...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't understand why you're so s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't understand why you're so set on what seems like a... *personal side-task*, but if you must, then let's get it over with..."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I know what's going on wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I know what's going on with you."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Did you just call me a *lady*, xer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you just call me a *lady*, xerife?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Who the fuck is Evrart?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who the fuck is Evrart?"

fields.Title: Drama: "Maybe if she thought you're... *cor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe if she thought you're... *corrupt*?

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Never mind," she sighs. "I remembe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind," she sighs. "I remember now. I'm still stuck in that traffic jam. In the *Fifties*," she adds with contempt.

fields.Title: You: ""Someone? Are these not your memori..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone? Are these not your memories?"

fields.Title: You: ""Well, aren't you a lady?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, aren't you a lady?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is a cow herder from upstream Magritte, the great steppes of Northern Mesque. People like Mañana, at the gates, have turned it into an ideology of sorts.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Moreover, the boots were size 37. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Moreover, the boots were size 37. Tiny. There are too many discrepancies in all this.

fields.Title: You: ""How do you pass through it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you pass through it?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""In the belly of an airship, behind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the belly of an airship, behind steel windows -- so you don't look straight into it. It's not *advised* to look into it."

fields.Title: Logic: "So he doesn't think she's the lady..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So he doesn't think she's the lady driver?

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She cups her ear and leans forward...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She cups her ear and leans forward. "Did you just call me a *lady*, xerife?"

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time to face yourself, mano y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time to face yourself, mano y mano. The next time you find yourself alone before a mirror. *That's* where this will end...

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""If you wait long enough, it's goin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you wait long enough, it's going to be much more than just 'love'... It's going to be the entire history -- vapourised."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She looks you over and scoffs. "You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks you over and scoffs. "You're right, lawman. *I'm* the one who should take *my* health more seriously. Thank you for looking out for me..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She glares at you. "Oh, this *xerif..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She glares at you. "Oh, this *xerife* is a smart one."

fields.Title: You: "(Nod solemnly.) "A beautiful song.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod solemnly.) "A beautiful song."

fields.Title: You: ""I was told of a woman driver. You'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was told of a woman driver. You're the only woman here."

fields.Title: You: ""Then who is the female driver I wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then who is the female driver I was told of?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Bad Hand Hermenegildo's *bad* hand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bad Hand Hermenegildo's *bad* hand strangled three hundred people. What can I say -- some people just really like strangling people.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""A pale dream, is what it is." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A pale dream, is what it is." She nods her head according to a rhythm known only to her -- staring at the photo in her hands.

fields.Title: You: ""What routes?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What routes?"

fields.Title: Composure: "As she says *carnaval* she gestures..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As she says *carnaval* she gestures to the empty square -- with the statue and the machines.

fields.Title: You: ""The... Adversary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The... Adversary?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why are you scary to the people wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you scary to the people who used to know you?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The big ones. The tracts. There's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The big ones. The tracts. There's no women and men there, it's all just..." She hums along, as if to a track on repeat...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is *exactly* what I didn't wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is *exactly* what I didn't want you to do..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You *are* an idiot. And you're kee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You *are* an idiot. And you're keeping me here. Glued to this racket. Unless there was anything else..." She puts the cigarette out and stares at something in the distance.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""'They say I've been away on a kind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'They say I've been away on a kind of holiday'..." She replies, silently.

fields.Title: Endurance: "A correct appraisal, you're quite s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A correct appraisal, you're quite shabby.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This man's got a hold over her. Eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man's got a hold over her. Even fifty years later, you can feel it...

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for now." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Paledriver: "She shrugs. "Whatever stupid things..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She shrugs. "Whatever stupid things they put in the lorry, I imagine."

fields.Title: You: ""Where could I get my hands on an *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where could I get my hands on an *experience* like that?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Your *mãe*, lawman. What of it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your *mãe*, lawman. What of it?"

fields.Title: You: ""For commerce, the lifeblood of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For commerce, the lifeblood of the isolas."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know, that's why I'm askin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, that's why I'm asking you."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Or -- I can just relax and let my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or -- I can just relax and let my mind carry me back where it will. To the great plains..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Then I don't suppose you could tel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then I don't suppose you could tell me where we are, lawman?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""No, the boiadeiro strangles his be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, the boiadeiro strangles his beloved and throws her body in the Magritte. Then he rides off, because the Western Plain is calling to him."

fields.Title: You: ""That's... not where I thought that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's... not where I thought that was going."

fields.Title: Paledriver: "A strikingly handsome man looks str..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A strikingly handsome man looks straight at you, his head crowned with a wide-brim hat. His hair is dark as an oil slick and his jaw is the most perfectly chiselled thing you've ever seen.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""How should I know? Do I look like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How should I know? Do I look like I spend a lot of time with the other camionneurs -- sniffing around -- when I have my movies to go to..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we're done here, no?" He c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we're done here, no?" He closes his notebook to stress it.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Oh, don't worry about me. I'm one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, don't worry about me. I'm one of the best camionneurs around. I drive routes no one else will."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Lomonossov's Land. Udachnaya Zemly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lomonossov's Land. Udachnaya Zemlya. The Western Plain..." She nods and closes her eyes again, letting her mind submerge...

fields.Title: You: ""Cool. Ride until you're dust, sist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool. Ride until you're dust, sister."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "In the background, a quiet song see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the background, a quiet song seeps from her cabin into the air. You don't hear any vocals.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""And what *is* that?" She sticks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what *is* that?" She sticks a filterless cigarette into a cigarette holder and reaches for the light.

fields.Title: You: ""No. I just remembered it myself."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I just remembered it myself." (Point to your head.) "With my head."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""And here I was thinking you were a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And here I was thinking you were an idiot." She breathes out and the air tastes sweet. "So, are you? An idiot, I mean."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've fried both your brains enou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've fried both your brains enough for today, detective..." He inspects her. No response.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""And that's just fine with me. I do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And that's just fine with me. I don't mind becoming vapour. I *like* vapour..." She gathers a cloud of smoke in her mouth, then slowly exhales.

fields.Title: You: ""I feel like there's still a *long..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel like there's still a *long way* to go."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because the problem isn't time, it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because the problem isn't time, it's *you*, detective..."

fields.Title: You: ""But Measurehead said she knows the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But Measurehead said she knows the secret to turning back time."

fields.Title: You: ""Show me the soles of your boots.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Show me the soles of your boots."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == true

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""What do I need drugs for, lawman?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do I need drugs for, lawman? What I see, what I *feel*, the Great Adversary... no drugs can compare."

fields.Title: You: ""If you say so..." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you say so..." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you want her attention you may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you want her attention you may need to be more forceful."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You have to understand -- a true b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have to understand -- a true boiadeiro needs a whole horizon to himself. He can't be tied down by man or woman. His beloved was selfish. She didn't know what it meant to love a *boiadeiro*."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Of course you don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course you don't."

fields.Title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "She says that as if something *narc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She says that as if something *narcotic* is the real reason.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The feet of a little girl," she sm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The feet of a little girl," she smiles. "They fit well on the pedals.

fields.Title: You: ""Fine. Let's change the subject.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. Let's change the subject."

fields.Title: You: ""The routes you drive are *unusual*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The routes you drive are *unusual*, aren't they."

fields.Title: You: ""Isn't that dangerous?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Isn't that dangerous?"

fields.Title: You: ""What does it feel like?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does it feel like?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*Hosiannna...*" A sigh escapes her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Hosiannna...*" A sigh escapes her lips, then silence, as she stares within herself.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Don't be stupid. The boiadeiro ret..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be stupid. The boiadeiro returns from the Western Plain a *changed* man. One night, as he and his beloved are out walking along the River Magritte, she pleads with him to give up his riding and settle down..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm looking for Ruby, the *lady dr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm looking for Ruby, the *lady driver*. Know anything about her?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.who_is_the_ladydriver"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.who_is_the_ladydriver_done"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.hardie_went_through_ruby_info"] == true

fields.Title: You: ""I feel like I'm getting *really* c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel like I'm getting *really* close."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers the slumpe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant considers the slumped form for a moment. He sighs.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Now what do you want with an old w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now what do you want with an old woman's boots, *xerife*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. If you're not involved with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. If you're not involved with the drug trafficking then why are you still waiting here?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""What are you hauling?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you hauling?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."]
You: ""Drugs!?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Drugs!?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Lawman," she greets you. "You caug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lawman," she greets you. "You caught me at an opportune moment. This awful weather keeps me awake. You can entertain me with your questions."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all I needed to know, thank..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all I needed to know, thanks." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The pale. Sounds like *the* drug to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pale. Sounds like *the* drug to me.

fields.Title: You: ""You don't have to protect me from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't have to protect me from this. I'm a big boy."

fields.Title: You: ""I can't operate in this world with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't operate in this world without knowing its basic terms."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, no. Just for detective work...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, no. Just for detective work. That's all I needed it for. Now..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Nostalgia. Cooped up in the cabin,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nostalgia. Cooped up in the cabin, shaking... Terrible nostalgia. For yourself. For humans. It's too much to bear. She loves it.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""It's a point you cannot come back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a point you cannot come back from. Your mind becomes so radiant with the past -- there is a flip." She flicks the ash from her cigarette. "Instead of writing, it erases memory. Nearing some kind of..." She shakes her head. "Indescribable *finale*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He asked the Pines rep about the pale -- and now he's talking to everyone about it..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""So the boiadeiro strangles his bel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So the boiadeiro strangles his beloved and throws her body in the Magritte. Then he rides off, because the Western Plain is calling to him."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Whatever it is about this woman, it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever it is about this woman, it's connected to *time* -- she knows the way back.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""You go right ahead, lawman. Let me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You go right ahead, lawman. Let me know when you find them. I can't wait to read their *report*..."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Huh?" That flicked a switch somewh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh?" That flicked a switch somewhere. "What is it? What do you want?"
fields.Alternate1: "Huh?" She comes to, as if nothing happened before. "What is it? What do you want?"

fields.Title: You: ""So you don't know what you're haul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you don't know what you're hauling in your own lorry?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: "The woman still has her eyes fixed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman still has her eyes fixed on the photograph in her hands. In the background, the radio plays.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Until you came along, that is." Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Until you came along, that is." The look she gives you is accusatory.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. What's that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. What's that?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Diamonds.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Diamonds."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*O sim*..." The woman stares at yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*O sim*..." The woman stares at you, her mind elsewhere now, on other matters.

fields.Title: Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == false
Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == false

fields.Title: !(Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == false)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true  and   Variable["XP.figured_out_the_odd_sole"] == false  and  Variable["jam.paledriver_composure_soles"] == false) == false

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Heroic doses, *xerife*. Heroic.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Heroic doses, *xerife*. Heroic."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""And dark. And the process begins...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And dark. And the process begins. Erasure. Kilometre by kilometre. In any direction. The Motorway South is a road you cannot come back from."

fields.Title: Logic: "So he doesn't think she's the smugg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So he doesn't think she's the smuggler?

fields.Title: Shivers: "You feel very cold suddenly. As if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel very cold suddenly. As if standing face to face with a terrifying adversary. Then the feeling dissipates and all you see is an ageing woman.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*Xerife*, what you understand woul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Xerife*, what you understand wouldn't fill a pamphlet..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "But there *is* one more kingsman to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But there *is* one more kingsman to confront.

fields.Title: Endurance: "No-no-no... you'll never figure out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No-no-no... you'll never figure out how to turn back time if you're not honest with her. Explain what's going on with you.

fields.Title: You: ""I blacked out -- from the love I f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I blacked out -- from the love I felt for my Motherland -- and lost all memory of the world."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Because I'm one of the best camion..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I'm one of the best camionneurs around, that's why. I drive routes no one else will."

fields.Title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

fields.Title: You: ""The Union boss?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Union boss?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Where am I? Who are you?" Like a m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where am I? Who are you?" Like a magician recalling a subject from hypnosis, you've jolted her back to reality.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing to do here." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing to do here." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Of course not. The boiadeiro retur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not. The boiadeiro returns from the Western Plain a *changed* man. One night, as he and his beloved are out walking along the River Magritte, she pleads with him to give up his riding and settle down..."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I see where this is going.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I see where this is going."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "That's correct. There is no visibil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's correct. There is no visibility of any of the others.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He's not buying it. "Just t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine." He's not buying it. "Just try not to black out again. And don't *contemplate*. We don't have time for that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Exactly* what I didn't want you t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Exactly* what I didn't want you to do..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

fields.Title: You: ""I feel I already *have* what you h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel I already *have* what you have. In some way."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "What if... to truly love a boiadeir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What if... to truly love a boiadeiro is to float lifeless downstream?

fields.Title: Endurance: "This is your chance. Ask her, is it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is your chance. Ask her, is it really possible?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you're serious about this, real..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you're serious about this, really truly serious, then I suggest you take a long, hard look in the mirror and ask yourself what's *really* going on..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "B-b-but what if you don't *like* wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: B-b-but what if you don't *like* what you find there? There'll be no going back from it...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Why don't you ever listen to us. We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why don't you ever listen to us. We tried to warn you that you wouldn't *like* what the mirror had to say...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He's figured out the pale. And now he's talking to everyone about it..."

fields.Title: You: ""How can you not know what you're h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How can you not know what you're hauling in your own lorry?"

fields.Title: You: ""What if the cargo is contraband?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if the cargo is contraband?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""While *you* people were tearing ea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "While *you* people were tearing each other apart over your petty little Revolution, in Mesque it was a golden age."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you alright, ma'am? You were o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you alright, ma'am? You were out."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Of course not. To truly understand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not. To truly understand the boiadeiro, you need to listen to 'On the Western Plain'."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""*This* is Gabriel Buenguerro..." S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*This* is Gabriel Buenguerro..." She shows you the photograph in the lavish amber frame.

fields.Title: Logic: "She doesn't actually think you're t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't actually think you're that smart.

fields.Title: Paledriver: "Nothing. Her smile just keeps widen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing. Her smile just keeps widening; her hair is grey like lead.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, it's definitely some kick, so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, it's definitely some kick, some *terrible* kick in the dark. A sleep kick. Perhaps you can find out later...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, it's definitely some kick. So..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, it's definitely some kick. Some *terrible* kick... the pale probably. This 'pale' sounds like it's the *shit*.

fields.Title: Drama: "He doesn't want your frail mind cau..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't want your frail mind caught up in something here. Something *unconnected* to the case. But connected to this woman tuning out like that.

fields.Title: Half Light: "I don't like the sound of any of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't like the sound of any of that. Sounds like a horrible drug. The worst one of them all.

fields.Title: Drama: "Yeah... it's not her. Believe me."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah... it's not her. Believe me.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Because they can no longer recogni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because they can no longer recognize the person I once was."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Some of them. Some of them are lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some of them. Some of them are like home to me now." She nods. "I would say the routes I drive are *usual* to me."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh -- I'm contemplating, Kim. I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh -- I'm contemplating, Kim. I'm drawing *existential conclusions* from this."

fields.Title: You: ""One last thing. You said we can ju..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One last thing. You said we can just become... vapour?"

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""They say there is a point -- one t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They say there is a point -- one that *I* have not crossed -- in the pale superdeep. If you stray too far off course on the U41-A, or in Lomonossov's Land... where every step you take is one step further from home, no matter the direction."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""No one knows what's at the *end......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one knows what's at the *end...*" She takes the cigarette out of the cigarette holder and extinguishes it. "I've only glimpsed the beginning."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you. Good bye." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you. Good bye." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""You're saying, one day I'll be abl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're saying, one day I'll be able to return to *love*..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been saying that for a whil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been saying that for a while. And yet, we only seem to be getting *further* from our actual goal..."

fields.Title: You: "Who?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who?

fields.Title: You: ""Blacked out. Should you be driving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Blacked out. Should you be driving a lorry if you get like that?"

fields.Title: You: ""Alright. Are you *the* lady driver?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright. Are you *the* lady driver?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.who_is_the_ladydriver"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.who_is_the_ladydriver_done"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.hardie_went_through_ruby_info"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Please? Help me out here. It's imp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please? Help me out here. It's important."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""It's diamonds, lawman. Obviously."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's diamonds, lawman. Obviously." She grins.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "In all likelihood, it's a world tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In all likelihood, it's a world that's only ever existed in her mind.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think I *do* know what you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I *do* know what you mean."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? I just told you why.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why? I just told you why."

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry to interrupt your dreaming,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry to interrupt your dreaming, ma'am."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Why not, *xerife*? It's not like I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not, *xerife*? It's not like I have anything better to do in this hellhole." She settles back against the railing of her motor lorry. Behind her, mountains of memorabilia, photos, and knicknacks line the dashboard.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Republic of Mesque is a massive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Republic of Mesque is a massive confederation on the isola of Mundi, the world's largest state by territory. It's a petrostate, a constitutional monarchy, and as of recently an outcast due to its tilt to the far right.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Please?" She raises her boot, slow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please?" She raises her boot, slowly, with contempt. "I think you should let me get back to Gabriel Buenguerro. You're no Gabriel. Gabriel doesn't say please..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes a quick note. "I could hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes a quick note. "I could have told you that from just looking at them. Her size is 37."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Those epithets are familiar somehow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Those epithets are familiar somehow -- The Great Adversary, The Great Unrest.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's death -- but for the Universe?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's death -- but for the Universe? Oh, we're contemplating the living *shit* out of this.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""When you've seen it all go *away*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When you've seen it all go *away* like that, rolling off like the sea, and then come back to this..." She gestures at the square. The broken horse monument, the clanging of machines in the distance.

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Paledriver: ""The *most* beautiful -- a true boi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *most* beautiful -- a true boiadeiro needs a whole horizon to himself. He can't be tied down by man or woman. His beloved was selfish. She didn't know what it meant to love a *boiadeiro*."
